name: Sayaka (itch)
description:
Sayaka is a short 20 minute horror game made in RPG Maker MV. You play as Naomi Wilson: a young female student from Riverford Academy. Who, wakes up inside a old abandoned warehouse. At first she thinks this must be a prank: by her friend and classmate Rosetta. However the realty of her situation is much different.

Note:
This game features some plug-ins from Yanify and Yami.
Also this game features some sounds and non-lyric based music from the Corpse
Party series and I am in no way laying claim to them by having
them in my game.
